document_data.name: Mez'Barris Armgo
document_data.mainbody: '''Mez'Barris Armgo''' was the [[matron mother]] of [[House Barrison Del'Armgo]], second house of [[Menzoberranzan]], in the mid-to-late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Description: Mez'Barris Armgo was unusually tall and powerful. She was also brilliant and had a vicious cunning. She was a fierce warrior who loved single combat.
document_data.History:
Mez'Barris became matron of her house prior to [[1361 DR]] and remained in that position in [[1372 DR]].

In the {{YearlinkName|1372}}, Mez'Barris held nominal command of the [[Army of the Black Spider]].

''Circa'' [[1486 DR]], she controlled the largest number of trained wizards and mercenaries-for-hire in Menzoberranzan.
document_data.Possessions: Mez'Barris had a pair of enchanted gloves that gave her great strength. Her weapons were magical maces named ''Qu'lith'' ("Blood") and ''Qu'uente'' ("Guts").
document_data.Relationships: Mez'Barris had five daughters. [[Uthegental Armgo]] was her patron.
